mapper.sql: SELECT kartlag_id, karttjenester_id, layers, scalemin, scalemax, downloadurl, ex_geographic_bounding_box_west_bound_longitude, ex_geographic_bounding_box_east_bound_longitude, ex_geographic_bounding_box_south_bound_latitude, ex_geographic_bounding_box_north_bound_latitude, keyword, queryable, sort, available, generic_title, modified, info_format
mapper.select: SELECT k.kartlag_id, k.karttjenester_id, k.layers, k.scalemin, k.scalemax, k.downloadurl, k.ex_geographic_bounding_box_west_bound_longitude, k.ex_geographic_bounding_box_east_bound_longitude, k.ex_geographic_bounding_box_south_bound_latitude, k.ex_geographic_bounding_box_north_bound_latitude, k.keyword, k.queryable, k.sort, k.available, k.generic_title, k.modified, k.info_format FROM kartlag k, kartbilder_kartlag kk WHERE kk.kartbilder_id=#{kartbilder_id} and k.kartlag_id=kk.kartlag_id order by kk.sort DESC

SELECT k.kartbilder_id as kartbilderId, k.hovedtemaer_id as hovedtemaerId, k.type as type, k.startextent_minx as startextentMinx, k.startextent_maxx as startextentMaxx, k.startextent_miny as startextentMiny, k.startextent_maxy as startextentMaxy, k.sort as sort, k.generic_title as genericTitle, k.modified as modified FROM kartbilder as k, kartbilder_kartlag kk WHERE kk.kartlag_id=#{kartlag_id} and k.kartbilder_id=kk.kartbilder_id

SELECT k.karttjenester_id as karttjenesterId, k.url as url, k.link2geonorge as link2geonorge, k.url_logo as urlLogo, k.url_organisation as urlOrganisation, k.generic_title as genericTitle, k.modified as modified, k.format as format, k.available as available , k.sk_tjenesteid as skTjenesteId FROM karttjenester as k WHERE k.karttjenester_id = #{karttjenester_id}
